title: How to Add Honors and Awards in LinkedIn

steps.title: Go to https://www.linkedin.com/feed/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.linkedin.com/feed/ in a web browser. You can use any web browser to add information to your honors and awards in LinkedIn.

steps.title: Click your profile picture and click View Profile.
steps.content: Click your profile picture and click View Profile . You'll see your profile picture in the upper right corner of the page next to Me .

steps.title: Click the blue Add profile section button.
steps.content: Click the blue Add profile section button. It's at the top of the profile. A menu will drop down.

steps.title: Click Accomplishments on the menu.
steps.content: Click Accomplishments on the menu. Another menu will expand to show you categories of accomplishments. If you already have the "Accomplishments" section on your profile, you can scroll down to find it and click + . You can also do this on the mobile app if you already have the "Honors & Award" section on your profile in "Accomplishments."

steps.title: Click Honors & Awards.
steps.content: Click Honors & Awards . It's near the middle of the list and a new window will pop up.

steps.title: Add the details of your honor or award.
steps.content: Add the details of your honor or award. You are required to add a title, but you can optionally click the drop-down menu under "Associated With" if you want to show the accomplishment was earned with a certain degree or job position. If you have the information available or know it, you can enter the name of the entity that gave you your award under "Issuer" as well as the date that you got the award or honor. Add a description to add details about your achievement such as the work required and skills achieved.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . You'll see this in the bottom right corner of the window. [2] X Research source
